Sepedon unicolor
Brunetti, 1929 : 34
(as Var. of
senegalensis
) ( Sierra Leone ). Synonymy by

.

subSubSection.paragraph: Holotype : ♀ , “ 29 September ” [ 1905-1906 ], [ TANZANIA ], “Steppe am Kilimandjaro ” ( NRS ).

WEST
AFRICA : SENEGAL : Basse-Casaurance, Djibelor, en rizière, 1♂ , 11.xii.1979 , J. Etienne ( MNHNP ).

GAMBIA: W. Div., Abuko Forest Reserve, 1♂, 16.xi.1993 , Deeming (NMWC); Abuko, on mature rice, 2♂, 24.xi.1993 , 1♀, 27.xi.1993 , Deeming & Shaw (NMWC); W. Div., Kombo District, Lamin Bridge, rice field nr. Lamin Bolan, tidal waterway, on young rice, 1♂1♀, 2.ix.1997 , D. J. Mann (OUM); Central River Div., N. Bank, Kuntaur Agric. Station, vegetation bordering R. Gambia, 1♀, 24.viii.1997 , D.J. Mann (OUM). GUINEA: Nimba, Nzo, 1♀, 1939, P. Lepesme, R. Paulian & A. Villiers; same locality 1♂, ii. vi.1942 , M. Lamotte; Nimba, 1♂1♀, 5.iii.1951 , Lamotte & Roy; 2♂2♀, vii–xii.1951 , Lamotte & Roy; Nimba, Yanlé, 1♂, 2.vi.1942 , M. Lamotte (all MNHNP). LIBERIA: Robertsport, 1♂, 19.xi.1943 ; 2♂, 26.xi.1942 , F.M. Snyder; Ghanga, 2♂, ix.1926 (AMNH); Lor Marquez, 1♂, 9.iv.1918 , C.W. Howard (USNM): no specific locality, 1♂, 22.x.1944 , M.S. Briscoe (USNM); Toppita, 2♂, 24.ix.1952 ; 2–5mi . E. Toppita, 1♂, 24.ix.1952 , Blickenstaff (USNM). IVORY COAST: Lamto, Yacó, rizière, 1♂, 20.xi.1970 , D. Lachaise; Réserve du Banco, 1♂, no date, Paulian & Delmare (MNHNP); Bouaké, 1♂, ii.1968 , G. Schmitz (MRAC). GHANA: Accra, Achimota, 1♂, 4.xi.1995 , M.R. Wilson (NMWC); Densu R. at Nsawam, 2♂, 8.xi.1970 , C.O. Berg (CU). NIGERIA: Zaria, Samaru, 1♀, 31.i.1970 ; 1♂, 3.ii.1970 ; 2♀, 18.ii.1970 ; 6♂3♀, 19.ii.1970 ; 1♀, 20.ii.1970 ; 1♀, 27.ii.1970 ; 1♀, 4.iii.1970 ; 1♀, 5.iii.1970 ; 1♂, 7.iii.1967 ; 1♂, 7.iii.1967 (Samaru Lake); 1♂, 19.xi.1970 ; 1♂1♀, 12.xii.1966 (Samaru Lake, Deeming (IARS); same locality, 1♂, 15.xi.1972 , J.L. Musa (IARS); 1♂, 3.i.1971 , J. Riley (Cornes/Riley coll.); 2♂2♀, 14.xii.1974 , M.A. Cornes (Cornes/Riley coll.); Samaru, 1♂, viii.1970 , P.H. Ward (NHMUK); Zaria, Samaru, Samau Lake, 7.iii.1967 (1♂, USNM), (1♀, NHMUK); same locality 1♀, 31.i.1967 ; 1♂, 24.x.1966 ; 3♂, 14.xi.1966 ; 1♂1♀, 27.xi.1967 ; 4♂1♀, 12.xii.1966 ; 1♀, 15.xii.1966 (all Deeming, published as

Biology.
Vala et al . 1995
; for the complete life-cycle (egg, I, II, III, Puparium), parasitoids/predators of semiterrestrial Succineidae snails; Knutson (2008) , confirmed this behavioural feeding.
